Attack primary target for 310% damage to primary target.
Gain an assist from a random __Asgard__ ally.

Special.Name: Divine Foresight
Special.Description:
Flip **Stealth** on each enemy.
Attack all enemies for 330% damage.
Clear **Heal Block** from self and all __Asgard__ allies.

Ultimate.Name: Sworn Oath
Ultimate.Description:
Attack primary target for 360% damage. Attack all adjacent targets for 330% damage.
Apply **Heal Block** to primary and secondary targets.

Passive.Name: The All-Seeing
Passive.Description:
Gain +10000% Resistance against **Blind**. __Asgard__ allies gain +10000% Resistance against __Blind__.
Gain +30% Focus. __Asgard__ allies gain +30% Focus.
On Turn, heal self for 5% of Max Health + 5% of Max Health per non-__Minion__ __Asgard__ ally.
On WAR DEFENSE, on Spawn, apply **Defense Up** to all __Asgard__ allies for 2 turns.

Basic.Name: Black Blade
Basic.Description:
Attack primary target for 300% damage + flip 1 **Deathproof** on target.
Attack the most injured enemy for 100% Piercing, ignoring **Taunt**.

Special.Name: Command Undead
Special.Description: Attack primary target for 350% damage + apply **Disrupted** for 2 turns. Gain an Assist from an Undead Asgardian.

Ultimate.Name: Death Knives
Ultimate.Description:
Clear 3 Deathproof from all enemies. Gain +5000% Extra Focus for this action.
Attack all enemies for 350% damage. Spread 4 negative effects from the primary target to all secondary targets.
This will not spread Stun.
Apply 2 Regeneration to all non-summoned ASGARDIAN allies.

Passive.Name: Goddess of Death
Passive.Description:
On Spawn, summon an Undead Asgardian.
On an Undead Asgardian's Death, summon an Undead Asgardian.
On Turn, heal self for 5% of Max Health + 5% of Max Health per non-summoned __Asgard__ ally.
Gain +15% Max Health. Gain +15% Max Health per non-summoned __Asgard__ ally.
On WAR DEFENSE:
> On non-summoned __Asgard__ ally's Death, summon an Undead Asgardian.
> Gain +25% Damage.
> __Asgard__ allies gain +25% Damage.

Basic.Name: Cosmic Rays
Basic.Description: Attack primary target for 290% damage. Barrier self for 10% of this character's Max Health.

Special.Name: Bending Light
Special.Description:
Clear 2 negative effects from self and all allies. Apply **Stealth** to self and all allies.
Apply **Defense Up** for 2 turns to self and all allies.
Clear **Stealth** from highest Health ally. Apply 3 **Deflect** + **Immunity** for 2 turns to highest Health ally.
Clear **Stealth** from all enemies.

Ultimate.Name: Psionic Shields
Ultimate.Description:
Apply **Offense Down** for 2 turns to all enemies.
Barrier all allies for 40% of this character's Max Health.

Passive.Name: Hard Light
Passive.Description:
When an enemy attacks this character with Barrier, attack that enemy for 250% damage.
When an enemy attacks a __FantasticFour__ ally with Barrier, attack that enemy for 250% damage.
Gain +20% Max Health. __FantasticFour__ and __Namor__ allies gain +20% Max Health.

Basic.Name: Psionic Beam
Basic.Description:
Attack primary target for 300% damage + 50% damage per non-Cloned __Marauders__ ally.
Gain an assist from a random Cloned ally.
Gain an assist from a random __Marauders__ ally.

Special.Name: Gene Therapy
Special.Description:
Clear **Heal Block** from the 2 most injured allies. Gain **Offense Up** for 2 turns.
Transfer all positive effects from an ally __Mystique__ to this character. Spread all positive effects from this character to all __Mutant__ or Cloned allies.
Heal all allies for 2000 Health + 20% of this character's Max Health.
Heal all Clones for 1500 Health + 10% of this character's Max Health.

Ultimate.Name: Clone
Ultimate.Description:
Summon a Clone of the primary target. This Clone scales with __Mister Sinister__'s stats instead of the primary target.
Clone gains **Defense Up** for 2 turns.
On WAR DEFENSE, generate 2 Ability Energy for all __Marauders__ and Cloned allies.

Passive.Name: Mutant Geneticist
Passive.Description:
On Spawn, generate 3 Ability Energy for this character if non-Cloned.
On turn, Heal 15% of Max Health + 5% of Max Health per __Marauders__ ally. Apply **Regeneration** to the 2 most injured __Mutant__ allies.
On __Marauders__ ally's turn, if this character's Health is greater than 50%, redistribute 10% Health from this character to that ally.
Gain +50% Focus. __Marauders__ allies gain +50% Focus.
Gain +20% Max Health. __Marauders__ allies gain +20% Max Health.
On WAR DEFENSE, __Marauders__ allies gain +30% Max Health.

Basic.Name: Fending Strike
Basic.Description:
Attack primary target for 280% damage.
Gain 2 **Deflect**.

Special.Name: Shield Slam
Special.Description:
Attack primary target for 340% damage.
Gain **Taunt** and 3 **Counter**.

Ultimate.Name: Whirling Blades
Ultimate.Description:
Attack primary target for 360% damage.
Rebound chain to 4-5 additional targets for 330% damage.
**Counter** breaks this Chain.
If __Thor__ is an ally, this attack cannot be counterattacked.

Passive.Name: Defender of Asgard
Passive.Description:
Gain +35% Block Chance. Gain +15% Block Amount.
Gain +10% Block Chance for each __Asgard__ ally.
On Spawn, gain **Defense Up** + 2 **Deflect**.
On Turn, heal self for 5% of Max Health + 5% of Max Health per non-minion __Asgard__ ally.

Basic.Name: Psychic Strike
Basic.Description:
Attack primary target for 300% damage.
If the target has **Taunt**, Gain +1 **Taunt**, up to a maximum of 3. Clear **Taunt** from the target.
If __Mister Sinister__ is an ally, transfer all positive effects from the primary target to __Mister Sinister__.

Special.Name: Superiority
Special.Description:
Gain +1 **Taunt**, up to a maximum of 3.
Gain 3 **Deflect** + Barrier self for 15% of this character's Max Health.
Generate 2 Ability Energy for 2 random __Marauders__ allies.

Ultimate.Name: Nullifying Blast
Ultimate.Description:
Apply **Ability Block** to primary target and adjacent targets.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for 420% damage.

Passive.Name: Grandeur
Passive.Description:
On Spawn, fill +10% Speed Bar + 10% Speed Bar per __Mutant__ __Villain__ ally.
On turn, if Taunting, gain +1 **Deflect** up to a maximum of 3.
When an allied __Mister Sinister__ drops below 50% Max Health, gain +1 **Taunt**, up to a maximum of 3 + gain Barrier for 15% of this character's Max Health.
On WAR DEFENSE:
> Gain +50% Resistance.
> __Mutant__ allies gain +50% Resistance.
> Gain +50% Focus.
> __Villain__ allies gain +50% Focus.

Basic.Name: Rapid Strikes
Basic.Description:
Attack primary target for 230% damage + clear **Counter**.
Gain an Assist from a random __Inhuman__ ally.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

Special.Name: Flurry
Special.Description:
Attack primary target for 170% damage + Bonus attack 2 times for 170% damage.
Repeat this attack on 3 additional random targets.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

Ultimate.Name: Run the Gauntlet
Ultimate.Description: Attack all enemies for 270% damage. Grant 1 ability energy to all __Inhuman__ allies.

Passive.Name: Swift Protector
Passive.Description:
On enemy turn, if this character has no other __Protector__ allies, apply **Offense Down** to that enemy. This cannot be dodged.
On ally non-__Minion__ __Shield__ or __Inhuman__ turn, 50% chance to apply **Evade** to that ally.
On Spawn, apply **Defense Up** to self and all non-__Minion__ __Shield__ or __Inhuman__ allies.
When a non-__Minion__ __Shield__ or __Inhuman__ ally drops below 50% Health, apply **Defense Up** to that ally.
Gain +25% Dodge chance.
Gain +10% Focus per non-__Minion__ __Shield__ and __Inhuman__ ally.

0.Name: Counter
0.Description: Upon being attacked by an enemy, attack them back.

1.Name: Deathproof
1.Description: Attacks that would defeat this character instead reduce Health to 1.

2.Name: Immunity
2.Description: Additional negative effects cannot be applied to this character

3.Name: Defense Up
3.Description: Decrease incoming damage by 50%. Increase resistance by 50%.

6.Name: Regeneration
6.Description: Heal by 10% of the source character's max health.

7.Name: Offense Up
7.Description: Increase outgoing damage by 50%.Increase focus by 50%.

9.Name: Stealth
9.Description: Stealth characters cannot be targeted if other targets are available.

10.Name: Taunt
10.Description: Taunting characters must be targeted first.

11.Name: Ability Block
11.Description: Cannot use Special or Ultimate abilities.

13.Name: Disrupted
13.Description: Additional positive effects cannot be applied to this character.

14.Name: Defense Down
14.Description: Increase incoming damage by 50%. Decrease resistance by 50%.

15.Name: Bleed
15.Description: Take damage equal to a percentage of the source character's damage.

17.Name: Offense Down
17.Description: Decrease outgoing damage by 50%. Decrease focus by 50%.

19.Name: Stun
19.Description: Miss next turn. *Cannot Dodge or Block while stunned*.
